creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: It’s just like the original Purple Heart, except this one got hallowed. Like everything else the Regime touches. Just like that, our Great Leader manages to devalue thousands of lost lives. Again.
title: September 5, 2020: DEMERIT
